metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8076 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The index_urlfetch function in index.c in Cyrus IMAP 2.3.x before 2.3.19, 2.4.x before 2.4.18, 2.5.x before 2.5.4 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors related to the urlfetch range, which triggers an out-of-bounds heap read.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8076` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cyrus-admin - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-admin-2.4 - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-clients - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-clients-2.4 - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-common - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-common-2.4 - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-imapd - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-imapd-2.4 - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-murder - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-murder-2.4 - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-nntpd - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-nntpd-2.4 - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-pop3d - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-pop3d-2.4 - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-replication - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
cyrus-replication-2.4 - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
libcyrus-imap-perl - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
libcyrus-imap-perl24 - 2.4.17+nocaldav-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd-2.4 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.17+nocaldav-2').
